snippet: It's remarkable that our system essentially puts a special tax on my company for offering people long-term employment - by charging more to insure older workers.
abstract: It's remarkable that our system essentially puts a special tax on my company for offering people long-term employment - by charging more to insure older workers.
lead_paragraph: First, thanks to everyone who encouraged me to keep writing (see my last post). The encouragement was, well, encouraging. I'll do my best to keep it real, with numbers when appropriate.

headline.main: Further Thoughts on Why Our Health Rates Fell
